name: Clear The Forest
description:
Help clear the forest from all the mutated monsters and deadly plants that took over! Use your jetpack to explore and navigate to unique locations to help rid the park from any enemies. Set the monsters on fire using your shotgun or CHOP away with your axe to deal some close range damage! Find treasure gems, health chests and tents to set up checkpoints throughout your journey!

Good Luck, Park Ranger!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

(Move left and right - "A, D")   

(Double Jump - "Spacebar")

(Switch weapons - "C")    

(Interact with objects - "E")    

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enemies:

Will run up to you and attack close range!
Will do a long rage attack when in his view!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Collectables:
In game currency
Restores 50 HP

 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
